V. MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS AND QUALIFICATIONS Have a bachelor’s degree in marketing, HR, or a related field.
Have 1-3 years of experience working in the technical sourcing aspect of human resources with proven success metrics, either in-house or agency.
Possess exceptional written and verbal communication skills
Desire to grow into other Recruiting or other Human Resources roles
Professional and friendly communications skills to conduct effective phone screens and relay essential job requirements to applicants.
Ability to learn and accurately describe the work environment, culture, benefits, and other company details to applicants.
Self-discipline to effectively structure your day to accomplish candidate pipeline goals consistently, day-to-day.
A desire to talk to numerous job applicants per day, primarily by phone.
A team spirit person with strong interpersonal skills driven by the willingness to achieve targets
